Label.Text: translate('#LDS#This view shows all compliance rule violations of members of {0}.', select current displaylong() from object) + " " +translate('#LDS#Note: This view displays live data.')

Column.Name: displaystatus
Column.Expression: (if (not(IsDecisionMade)) then translate("#LDS#Decision pending") else if ( not(IsExceptionGranted)) then translate("#LDS#Exception denied") else translate("#LDS#Exception granted"))
Column.Caption: translate("#LDS#Approval state")
